cookie_consent.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

home.intro: Developer tools, financial calculators, and productivity boosters. All the utilities you need in one place.

word_counter.title: Word Counter
word_counter.description: Count words and characters in your text.
word_counter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...
word_counter.seo_content: This is a free online word counter tool. It helps you count words and characters for your essays, articles, and social media posts.

guide.title: Enter Text
guide.description: Type or paste your text into the input area.

guide.title: Check Results
guide.description: The word and character counts update instantly as you type.

guide.title: Analyze
guide.description: Use the detailed stats to see sentence and paragraph counts.

faq.question: Is there a limit on text length?
faq.answer: No, you can paste as much text as your browser can handle.

faq.question: Is my text saved?
faq.answer: No, all analysis is performed locally in your browser. Your text is not sent to any server.

json_formatter.title: JSON Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify your JSON data.
json_formatter.seo_content: Free online JSON Formatter and Validator. Beautify and minify your JSON data with a single click. Fix indentation, validate syntax, and make your JSON readable.
json_formatter.how_to_step1: Paste your messy or minified JSON into the input area.
json_formatter.how_to_step2: Click the 'Format' button to beautify the code.
json_formatter.how_to_step3: Use 'Minify' to remove whitespace for production use.
json_formatter.how_to_step4: Click 'Copy' to copy the result to your clipboard.
json_formatter.faq_1_q: Why is my JSON not formatting?
json_formatter.faq_1_a: Check if your JSON is valid. Common errors include missing quotes around keys or trailing commas. Our tool will highlight syntax errors.
json_formatter.faq_2_q: Can I format large JSON files?
json_formatter.faq_2_a: Yes, our tool is optimized for performance and can handle large JSON strings efficiently within your browser.
json_formatter.use_case_1: Beautifying minified API responses for debugging.
json_formatter.use_case_3: Minifying JSON configuration files to save space.

guide.title: Paste JSON
guide.description: Paste your messy or minified JSON string into the input area.

guide.title: Format or Minify
guide.description: Click 'Format' to beautify the code with proper indentation, or 'Minify' to remove whitespace for production use.

guide.title: Validate
guide.description: The tool automatically checks for syntax errors. If there's an error, it will be highlighted.

guide.title: Copy Result
guide.description: Click the copy button to save the result to your clipboard.

faq.question: How to fix 'Invalid JSON' error?
faq.answer: Common JSON errors include trailing commas, missing quotes around keys, or using single quotes instead of double quotes. Our tool highlights the line with the error.

faq.question: Difference between Minify and Beautify?
faq.answer: Minify removes all unnecessary whitespace (newlines, spaces) to reduce file size. Beautify adds indentation and newlines to make the code human-readable.

faq.question: Is my JSON data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, all processing is done locally in your browser (client-side). Your data is never sent to our servers.

lotto_generator.title: Lotto Number Generator
lotto_generator.description: Generate 6 lucky lotto numbers for free.
lotto_generator.seo_content: Free online lottery number generator. Randomly draw 6 numbers from 1 to 45 to test your luck. Save and manage your generated numbers.

guide.title: Generate
guide.description: Click the 'Generate Numbers' button to get a random set of 6 numbers (1-45).

guide.title: Save Numbers
guide.description: Click 'Save' to keep the current set in your history list.

guide.title: Manage
guide.description: View your saved numbers or clear them to start over.

faq.question: Can this predict winning numbers?
faq.answer: No, this tool uses a random number generator for entertainment purposes only. It cannot predict future lottery results.

faq.question: Is it truly random?
faq.answer: Yes, we use a cryptographically secure random number generator provided by your browser.

use_cases: Picking random numbers for lottery tickets.
Testing probability or luck for fun.
Generating random datasets for educational purposes.

server_time.title: Server Time Check
server_time.description: Check the exact server time of any website.
server_time.subtitle: Essential for ticketing and course registration where every second counts.
server_time.tip1: Works on the same principle as Navyism.
server_time.tip2: Calculates time based on the server's Date header information.
server_time.tip3: Minor deviations may occur due to network latency.
server_time.tip4: Watch the time flow in real-time without refreshing.
server_time.seo_content: Free online server time checker tool. Check the exact server time of Ticketmaster, StubHub, or any website down to 0.1 seconds. Essential tool for successful ticket purchases and course registration.

guide.title: Enter URL
guide.description: Enter the website URL (e.g., ticketmaster.com) you want to check.

guide.title: Check
guide.description: Click the 'Check' button to retrieve the server's current time.

guide.title: Sync
guide.description: Watch the seconds to synchronize your actions exactly.

faq.question: Why is server time important?
faq.answer: For competitive events like ticketing, even a second difference between your clock and the server's clock can mean failure.

faq.question: How accurate is it?
faq.answer: We fetch the HTTP Date header directly from the server, providing high accuracy relative to network latency.

stock_average_calculator.title: Stock Average Down Calculator
stock_average_calculator.description: Calculate your new average price by entering your current holdings and additional purchases.
stock_average_calculator.seo_content: Free stock average down calculator. Calculate how much you can lower your average price by buying more shares. Essential tool for successful stock and crypto investing.

guide.title: Current Holdings
guide.description: Enter your current stock price and quantity.

guide.title: New Purchase
guide.description: Enter the price and quantity of the new shares you plan to buy.

guide.title: Calculate
guide.description: Click Calculate to see your new lowered average price.

faq.question: What is 'averaging down'?
faq.answer: Averaging down is an investment strategy where you buy more shares of a stock at a lower price than your initial purchase, thereby lowering the average cost per share.

use_cases: lowering break-even point for underwater stocks.
Planning additional investments in a dipping market.

ticketing_practice.title: Ticketing Practice Game
ticketing_practice.description: Improve your click speed and accuracy with realistic ticketing practice.
ticketing_practice.share_message: Ticketing Practice Score: {score}! Can you beat me? üëâ
ticketing_practice.seo_content: Free ticketing practice game for Ticketmaster, StubHub, etc. Improve your reaction speed and click accuracy to secure the tickets you want.

guide.title: Wait for Open
guide.description: Watch the countdown timer carefully.

guide.title: Click Fast
guide.description: As soon as the button becomes active, click it immediately.

guide.title: Check Score
guide.description: See your reaction time and milliseconds elapsed. Try to improve.

faq.question: Does this guarantee tickets?
faq.answer: No, real ticketing sites depend on server load and internet speed, but this helps train your reflexes.

faq.question: What is a good time?
faq.answer: For highly competitive concerts, clicking within 100-300ms of the button opening is often required.

salary_calculator.title: Real Salary Calculator (US)
salary_calculator.description: Calculate your estimated monthly take-home pay after Federal, State, and FICA taxes.
salary_calculator.seo_content: US Salary Calculator 2025. Estimate your paycheck after Federal Tax, Social Security, Medicare, and State Taxes.

guide.title: Enter Salary
guide.description: Input your annual gross salary.

guide.title: Review Taxes
guide.description: The calculator automatically estimates Federal, State, and FICA taxes.

guide.title: Get Results
guide.description: See your estimated monthly take-home pay immediately.

faq.question: How accurate is this calculator?
faq.answer: It provides an estimate based on standard 2024-2025 tax brackets. Actual pay may vary due to specific deductions (401k, etc.) and filing status.

faq.question: What is FICA?
faq.answer: FICA is a mandatory payroll tax funding Social Security and Medicare.

use_cases: Estimating take-home pay for a new job offer.
Budgeting monthly expenses based on real income.

image_to_base64.title: Image to Base64 Converter
image_to_base64.description: Convert image files to Base64 strings. Useful for embedding images directly into HTML or CSS.
image_to_base64.upload_label: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
image_to_base64.guide_title: How to Convert Image to Base64

guide.title: Upload Image
guide.description: Drag and drop your image file or click to select from your device.

guide.title: Automatic Conversion
guide.description: The tool automatically converts the image to a Base64 string.

guide.title: Copy Result
guide.description: Click 'Copy Base64' to save the string to your clipboard.

faq.question: What is Base64?
faq.answer: Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that represents binary data in an ASCII string format.

faq.question: Does it increase file size?
faq.answer: Yes, Base64 strings are approximately 33% larger than the original binary file.

image_to_base64.use_case_1: Embedding small icons directly into HTML or CSS.
image_to_base64.use_case_3: Transferring image data over text-only protocols.

base64_to_image.title: Base64 Image Decoder
base64_to_image.description: Convert Base64 strings back to image files. Preview and download the result.
base64_to_image.guide_title: How to Convert Base64 to Image

guide.title: Paste String
guide.description: Paste your Base64 string into the input field.

guide.title: Decode
guide.description: Click 'Decode' (if manual) or wait for auto-detection.

guide.title: Download
guide.description: Preview the image and click 'Download' to save it.

faq.question: What formats are supported?
faq.answer: We support most common image formats like PNG, JPEG, GIF, and WEBP.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, decoding happens entirely in your browser.

base64_to_image.use_case_2: Recovering images from database text dumps.
base64_to_image.use_case_3: Debugging Data URIs in web development.

compound_interest.title: Compound Interest Calculator
compound_interest.description: Calculate the future value of your investment with monthly contributions.
compound_interest.subtitle: See how your money grows over time with the power of compound interest.
compound_interest.seo_content: Free online compound interest calculator. Visualize your investment growth with monthly contributions. Essential tool for financial planning and retirement strategy.

guide.title: Enter Principal
guide.description: Input your initial investment amount.

guide.title: Add Monthly Contribution
guide.description: Enter the amount you plan to add each month.

guide.title: Set Rate & Time
guide.description: Input the annual interest rate and investment duration in years.

guide.title: Calculate
guide.description: Click Calculate to see the future value and interest earned.

faq.question: What is Compound Interest?
faq.answer: Compound interest is the interest on a loan or deposit calculated based on both the initial principal and the accumulated interest from previous periods.

faq.question: Why is it powerful?
faq.answer: Because of its exponential growth potential. Small regular investments can grow into significant sums over long periods due to compounding.

use_cases: Calculating returns on stock market investments.
Visualizing the benefits of starting to invest early.

uuid_generator.title: UUID Generator
uuid_generator.description: Generate and copy secure, unique UUID v4 strings in bulk.
uuid_generator.subtitle: Bulk UUID generation tool for developers
uuid_generator.seo_content: Free online UUID Generator. Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly. Essential for developers needing unique identifiers for databases and applications.

guide.title: Set Quantity
guide.description: Select the number of UUIDs you want to generate (default is 1).

guide.title: Generate
guide.description: Click the 'Generate' button.

guide.title: Copy One
guide.description: Click the copy icon next to a UUID to copy it.

guide.title: Copy All
guide.description: Use 'Copy All' to copy the entire list.

faq.question: Are these UUIDs unique?
faq.answer: Yes, we generate Version 4 UUIDs which are randomly generated. The probability of collision is astronomically low.

faq.question: Can I generate bulk UUIDs?
faq.answer: Yes, you can generate multiple UUIDs at once using the quantity selector.

uuid_generator.use_case_1: Generating unique primary keys for database records.
uuid_generator.use_case_2: Creating unique session IDs or transaction IDs.
uuid_generator.use_case_3: Assigning unique filenames to uploaded assets.

unit_converter.title: Unit Converter
unit_converter.description: Convert various units such as length, weight, volume, area, and temperature quickly and easily.
unit_converter.seo_content: Free online unit converter. Convert meters, inches, feet, kilograms, pounds, Celsius, Fahrenheit, and more for daily life and work.

faq.question: Which units are supported?
faq.answer: We support common units for length (m, ft, in), weight (kg, lb), temperature (C, F), volume, and area.

faq.question: Is the conversion accurate?
faq.answer: Yes, we use standard conversion factors for precise calculations.

use_cases: Converting cooking measurements (cups to ml, oz to g).
Travel conversions (miles to km, Fahrenheit to Celsius).

jwt_decoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwt_decoder.description: Decode JWTs instantly in your browser. No server-side processing for your security.
jwt_decoder.privacy_alert: Your token is decoded locally in your browser and never sent to any server.
jwt_decoder.seo_content: Free online JWT Decoder. Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens (JWT) instantly. View header, payload, and signature details without sending data to a server.

guide.title: Paste JWT
guide.description: Paste your JWT string into the input area.

guide.title: Auto Decode
guide.description: The tool will automatically decode the token.

guide.title: View Details
guide.description: View the Header, Payload, and Signature sections.

guide.title: Check Claims
guide.description: Check the expiration time and other claims.

faq.question: Is it safe to paste my JWT here?
faq.answer: Yes, decoding is done entirely in your browser. Your tokens are never sent to our servers.

faq.question: Can I verify the signature?
faq.answer: Currently, we only support decoding. Signature verification requires your secret key, which you should not share.

jwt_decoder.use_case_1: Debugging authentication issues in web applications.
jwt_decoder.use_case_3: Verifying the structure of a JWT.

unix_timestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix_timestamp.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa.
unix_timestamp.seo_content: Free online Unix Timestamp Converter. Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Supports seconds, milliseconds, and microseconds.

guide.title: Timestamp to Date
guide.description: Enter a Unix timestamp to see the date in UTC and Local time.

guide.title: Date to Timestamp
guide.description: Select a specific date and time to generate its Unix timestamp.

guide.title: Auto Detect
guide.description: The tool automatically detects seconds (10 digits) or milliseconds (13 digits).

guide.title: Copy Result
guide.description: Click the copy button to use the result in your code.

faq.question: What is the Unix Epoch?
faq.answer: It is 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970.

faq.question: Does it handle timezones?
faq.answer: The input timestamp is UTC. The output shows both UTC and your local time.

cron_generator.title: Cron Expression Generator
cron_generator.description: Generate complex Cron schedules easily with a few clicks.
cron_generator.seo_content: Free online Cron Expression Generator. Create Linux Crontab schedules easily with a GUI and get human-readable descriptions. Set up recurring tasks for minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months.

guide.title: Select Frequency
guide.description: Select the frequency tab (Minutes, Hourly, Daily, Weekly, Monthly).

guide.title: Configure Settings
guide.description: Configure the specific time and day settings.

guide.title: Auto Generate
guide.description: The Cron expression is automatically generated below.

guide.title: Copy Result
guide.description: Click 'Copy' to use it in your crontab file.

faq.question: What is Cron?
faq.answer: Cron is a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Users use cron to schedule jobs (commands or scripts) to run periodically at fixed times, dates, or intervals.

faq.question: Does this support 5 or 6 fields?
faq.answer: This tool generates standard 5-field cron expressions (minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week) used in most Linux systems.

roi_calculator.title: ROI Calculator
roi_calculator.description: Calculate Return on Investment (ROI) and annualized ROI.
roi_calculator.seo_content: Free online ROI Calculator. Calculate Return on Investment and Annualized ROI to evaluate the efficiency of an investment.

guide.title: Enter Investment
guide.description: Input the initial amount you invested.

guide.title: Enter Return
guide.description: Input the final value or amount returned.

guide.title: Calculate
guide.description: Click 'Calculate' to see the ROI percentage.

faq.question: What is the ROI formula?
faq.answer: ROI = ((Final Value - Initial Cost) / Initial Cost) * 100%.

youtube_calculator.title: YouTube Earnings Calculator
youtube_calculator.description: Estimate your daily, monthly, and yearly potential earnings on YouTube.
youtube_calculator.disclaimer: Estimates only. Actual earnings vary by niche, country, and engagement.
youtube_calculator.seo_content: Free YouTube Money Calculator. Estimate your potential earnings from YouTube AdSense based on daily views and RPM.

guide.title: Enter Views
guide.description: Input your average daily video views.

guide.title: Set RPM
guide.description: Enter your estimated RPM (Revenue Per Mille/Thousand views). Standard range is $0.5 - $5.0.

guide.title: Check Earnings
guide.description: See your estimated daily, monthly, and yearly income.

faq.question: What is RPM?
faq.answer: RPM stands for Revenue Per Mille (thousand). It represents how much money you earn for every 1,000 views.

faq.question: Are these figures exact?
faq.answer: No, they are estimates. Actual earnings depend on ad types, viewer location, and niche.

pomodoro_timer.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro_timer.description: Boost productivity with the Pomodoro Technique. 25 min focus, 5 min break.
pomodoro_timer.seo_content: Free online Pomodoro Timer. Boost your focus and productivity with the 25-minute work and 5-minute break cycle. Optimized for study, work, and coding.

guide.title: Set Tasks
guide.description: Decide on the task you need to complete.

guide.title: Start Timer
guide.description: Start the 25-minute focus timer and work on your task.

guide.title: Take a Break
guide.description: When the alarm rings, take a 5-minute short break.

guide.title: Repeat Cycle
guide.description: Repeat the cycle 4 times, then take a longer break (15-30 min).

faq.question: What is the Pomodoro Technique?
faq.answer: It's a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo that uses a timer to break work into intervals, typically 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks.

faq.question: Can I change the time intervals?
faq.answer: Yes, you can customize the focus, short break, and long break durations in the settings.

use_cases: Studying for exams or learning new skills.
Focusing on deep work or coding tasks.
Managing meaningful breaks to prevent burnout.

password_generator.title: Password Generator
password_generator.seo_content: Free online Password Generator. Create strong, secure passwords instantly. Customize length, include symbols, numbers, and uppercase letters to protect your accounts.

guide.title: Set Length
guide.description: Adjust the slider to choose your desired password length (12+ recommended).

guide.title: Select Options
guide.description: Check boxes to include Uppercase, Numbers, and Symbols for better security.

guide.title: Generate
guide.description: Click 'Generate' to create a new random password.

guide.title: Copy
guide.description: Click the copy icon to save the password to your clipboard.

faq.question: Are these passwords secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we use a cryptographically strong random number generator in your browser. The passwords are never sent to our servers.

faq.question: What is a good password length?
faq.answer: We recommend a minimum of 12 characters, mixing letters, numbers, and symbols for better security.

use_cases: Creating unique passwords for new accounts.
Replacing weak passwords with strong ones.
Generating API keys or random tokens.

qr_code.title: QR Code Generator
qr_code.description: Convert URLs, text, emails, and more into QR codes and download them.
qr_code.seo_content: Free online QR Code Generator. Convert website links, text, and contact info into QR codes and download as PNG images. Customize colors and size freely.

guide.title: Download

faq.question: Do these QR codes expire?
faq.answer: No, standard static QR codes never expire. They work as long as the content (link) is valid.

faq.question: Is there a scan limit?
faq.answer: No, you can scan them an unlimited number of times.

use_cases: Sharing website URLs on print materials.
Encoding text messages or contact info.
Creating scannable coupons or promotion codes.

faq.question: How do I calculate X% of Y?
faq.answer: Multiply Y by X, then divide by 100. Or use our first calculator mode.

bmi_calculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmi_calculator.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on height and weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_underweight: You are underweight. It's important to eat a balanced diet and consult a healthcare provider to reach a healthy weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_normal: Great job! You have a healthy weight. Maintain your balanced diet and regular exercise to stay healthy.
bmi_calculator.tip_overweight: You are slightly overweight. Consider a balanced diet and regular physical activity to manage your weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_obese: You are in the obese range. It is recommended to consult a healthcare provider for a personalized weight management plan.
bmi_calculator.tip_severe_obese: You are in the severely obese range. Please consult a healthcare provider for immediate medical advice and support.
bmi_calculator.seo_content: Free online BMI Calculator. Enter your height and weight to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and check your weight status. Essential tool for health management.

guide.title: Enter Height & Weight
guide.description: Input your height in cm and weight in kg.

guide.title: Calculate
guide.description: Click Calculate to see your BMI score.

guide.title: Check Status
guide.description: See if you are underweight, normal, overweight, or obese based on the WHO classification.

faq.question: What is BMI?
faq.answer: BMI (Body Mass Index) is a simple calculation using a person's height and weight to categorize weight status.

faq.question: Is BMI accurate for athletes?
faq.answer: BMI doesn't distinguish between muscle and fat, so athletes with high muscle mass might be classified as overweight.

vat_calculator.title: VAT Calculator
vat_calculator.description: Calculate VAT (Value Added Tax) inclusive and exclusive prices.
vat_calculator.seo_content: Free online VAT Calculator. Easily calculate VAT inclusive and exclusive amounts. Supports custom VAT rates.

guide.title: Select Action

faq.question: values rounded?
faq.answer: Yes, values are typically rounded to 2 decimal places suitable for currency.

use_cases: Calculating tax refunds for shopping abroad.

aspect_ratio_calculator.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspect_ratio_calculator.description: Calculate dimensions based on aspect ratio. Useful for designers, developers, and video editors.
aspect_ratio_calculator.seo_content: Free online Aspect Ratio Calculator. Calculate width or height based on 16:9, 4:3, 21:9 and other common aspect ratios. Essential tool for responsive design and video editing.

guide.title: Select Ratio

guide.title: Auto Calculate
guide.description: The tool automatically calculates the missing dimension.

guide.title: Use Result
guide.description: Use the result for your design or video project.

faq.question: What is Aspect Ratio?
faq.answer: Aspect Ratio is the proportional relationship between the width and height of an image or screen.

faq.question: What is the standard aspect ratio for YouTube?
faq.answer: The standard aspect ratio for YouTube videos is 16:9. Vertical Shorts use 9:16.

aspect_ratio_calculator.use_case_1: Resizing images for social media posts.

country_capital_quiz.title: Country Capital Quiz
country_capital_quiz.description: Explore countries and capitals of the world. Test your knowledge with a fun quiz!

faq.answer: The average human visual reaction time is around 250ms. Below 200ms is very fast.

faq.question: What is BMR versus TDEE?
faq.answer: BMR is calories burned at rest. TDEE is total calories burned including activity.

faq.question: Should I eat below BMR?
faq.answer: Eating below BMR is generally not recommended as it can slow metabolism. Aim for a deficit from TDEE.

use_cases: Setting a calorie baseline for diets.

faq.question: What is TDEE?
faq.answer: TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) is the amount of calories you burn daily, including exercise.

faq.answer: It provides a solid estimate based on established formulas. Adjust based on your actual progress.

faq.question: What is CIDR?
faq.answer: Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) is a method for allocating IP addresses and IP routing. It replaces the older classful network design.

faq.question: How many hosts are in a /24 subnet?
faq.answer: A /24 subnet has 256 total IP addresses, but 254 are usable for hosts (one for network address, one for broadcast).

faq.question: What is Regex?
faq.answer: Regular Expressions (Regex) are sequences of characters that define a search pattern. They are used for string searching and manipulation.

faq.question: What does the 'g' flag do?
faq.answer: The 'g' (global) flag indicates that the regex should be tested against all possible matches in a string, not just the first one.

color_palette.title: Color Palette Generator
color_palette.description: Extract dominant colors from an image and generate a palette.
color_palette.upload_label: Drag & Drop or Click to Upload Image
color_palette.seo_content: Extract beautiful color palettes from any image. Our tool analyzes your photos to find the dominant colors and provides Hex, RGB, and HSL codes. Perfect for designers, artists, and developers.
color_palette.how_to_step1: Upload an image by dragging and dropping or clicking the upload area.
color_palette.how_to_step2: Wait for the tool to analyze the image automatically.
color_palette.how_to_step3: View the extracted color palette with Hex and RGB codes.
color_palette.how_to_step4: Click on any color code to copy it to your clipboard.
color_palette.faq_1_a: We support all common web image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF.
color_palette.faq_2_q: Is my image uploaded to a server?
color_palette.faq_2_a: No, your privacy is important. Image processing happens entirely in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers.
color_palette.use_case_1: Web Designers looking for a color scheme that matches a hero image.
color_palette.use_case_2: Digital Artists creating cohesive artwork based on reference photos.
color_palette.use_case_3: Developers needing exact color codes from design mockups.

url_encoder.title: URL Encoder / Decoder
url_encoder.description: Encode or decode URLs simply and securely. Convert special characters to their percent-encoded versions.
url_encoder.placeholder: Enter text to encode or decode...
url_encoder.seo_content: Free online URL Encoder/Decoder tool. Easily convert text to URL-safe format (percent-encoding) or decode encoded URLs back to readable text. Essential for web developers and SEO.

guide.title: Input Text
guide.description: Enter or paste your text/URL into the input box.

guide.title: Encode
guide.description: Click 'Encode' to convert special characters to % codes.

guide.title: Decode
guide.description: Click 'Decode' to convert % codes back to normal text.

guide.title: Copy Result
guide.description: Use the 'Copy' button to save the result to your clipboard.

faq.question: What is URL Encoding?
faq.answer: URL encoding converts characters into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet. It replaces unsafe ASCII characters with a '%' followed by two hexadecimal digits.

faq.question: Why do I need to encode URLs?
faq.answer: URLs can only contain a limited set of characters. Spaces and other special symbols must be encoded to ensure the URL is valid and works correctly across all browsers and servers.

url_encoder.use_case_1: Preparing query string parameters for API calls.
url_encoder.use_case_2: Fixing broken links containing special characters.
url_encoder.use_case_3: Decoding complex URLs to read their parameters.

meta_tag_generator.title: Meta Tag Generator
meta_tag_generator.description: Generate SEO-friendly Meta Tags and Open Graph tags for social media sharing. Preview how your website looks on Google and Facebook.
meta_tag_generator.seo_content: Boost your SEO and social media presence with our free Meta Tag Generator. Create perfect title tags, meta descriptions, and Open Graph (OG) tags to ensure your content looks great on Google, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

guide.title: Enter Info
guide.description: Enter your website's Title and Description. Keep them concise and keyword-rich.

guide.title: Add Links
guide.description: Add your Site URL and a link to your representative image (OG Image).

guide.title: Preview
guide.description: Check the 'Google Preview' and 'Social Preview' to see how it looks.

guide.title: Copy Code
guide.description: Click 'Copy Code' and paste the HTML into the <head> section of your website.

faq.question: What are Meta Tags?
faq.answer: Meta tags are snippets of text that describe a page's content. They don't appear on the page itself but only in the page's source code. They tell search engines what a web page is about.

faq.question: What is Open Graph (OG)?
faq.answer: Open Graph tags control how your content is displayed when shared on social media platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest. They allow you to set a custom title, description, and image.

meta_tag_generator.use_case_1: Bloggers wanting to optimize their posts for search engines.
meta_tag_generator.use_case_2: Developers needing to quickly generate standard SEO tags.
meta_tag_generator.use_case_3: Marketers ensuring their landing pages look attractive on social media.

privacy.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy.data_collection_content: We do not collect any personal data that can identify you directly. However, we may collect non-personal data such as browser type, operating system, and IP address for analytics purposes to improve our service.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies.
privacy.adsense_content_1: We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
privacy.adsense_content_2: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings.
privacy.security_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. For tools like our "Word Counter", all processing happens in your browser. Your text data is never sent to our servers.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: support@cheetset.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions.
terms.usage_content: You must use our services for lawful purposes only. Our tools are provided 'as is' without any warranties.
terms.disclaimer_content: Cheetset does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the service. In particular, results from financial tools (Salary Calculator, Compound Interest Calculator, etc.) should be used for reference only.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@cheetset.com
